products.name: NOGOR Special Hoodie and Joggers Set.
products.description: Looking for a stylish and comfortable t-shirt that can go with any outfit? Look no further than this short-sleeved crew neck Play Quality Half Sleeve Jersey. This t-shirt is made of 95% polyester and 5% synthetic fabric, which gives it a soft and stretchy feel. The slim fit and straight hem make it flattering and easy to wear.
point_description: The perfect piece, made from our customer’s voice.
